mapper.select:
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT C.CLASS_NO, OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) EP_PRICE FROM CLASS C JOIN THUMBNAIL_IMG T ON(C.CLASS_NO = T.CLASS_NO) JOIN CLASS_CATEGORY ON(CATG_NO = CT_NO) JOIN TEACHER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN CT_DETAIL USING(CT_DETAIL_NO) WHERE TH_IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND MEMBER_ST = 0
AND CLASS_TYPE = 0 AND CLASS_TYPE = 1
AND ((CLASS_AREA LIKE '%${search}%' OR CLASS_NM LIKE '%${search}%' OR CT_NM LIKE '%${search}%' OR MEMBER_NM LIKE '%${search}%' OR CT_DETAIL_NM LIKE '%${search}%'))
AND C.CLASS_NO IN (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS_WISH WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo})
AND (
OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) < 10000 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) BETWEEN 10000 AND 29999 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) BETWEEN 30000 AND 49999 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) BETWEEN 50000 AND 99999 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) >= 100000
)
AND CLASS_AREA LIKE '%'||#{classArea1}||'%'
AND CLASS_AREA LIKE '%'||#{classArea2}||'%'
AND CLASS_TYPE =
0 1
) WHERE EP_PRICE IS NOT NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT C.CLASS_NO, CLASS_AREA, CLASS_TYPE, OPEN_EP_COUNT(C.CLASS_NO) EP_NO, CLASS_NM, TH_IMG_NM, CT_NM, TEACHER_IMG, MEMBER_NM, CT_DETAIL_NM, THEME_IMG,
OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) EP_PRICE,
NVL((SELECT ROUND(AVG(RE_STAR), 1) FROM CLASS JOIN EPISODE USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN REGISTER USING(EP_NO) JOIN REVIEW USING(REG_NO) WHERE C.CLASS_NO = CLASS_NO), 0) STAR_AVG, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_WISH WHERE C.CLASS_NO = CLASS_NO) HEART_COUNT, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM CLASS_WISH WHERE C.CLASS_NO = CLASS_NO AND MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo}) HEART_FLAG FROM CLASS C JOIN THUMBNAIL_IMG T ON(C.CLASS_NO = T.CLASS_NO) JOIN CLASS_CATEGORY ON(CATG_NO = CT_NO) JOIN TEACHER USING(MEMBER_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN CT_DETAIL USING(CT_DETAIL_NO) LEFT JOIN CLASS_THEME CTH ON(C.CLASS_NO = CTH.CLASS_NO) LEFT JOIN THEME USING(THEME_NO) WHERE TH_IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND MEMBER_ST = 0
AND (
OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) < 10000 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) BETWEEN 10000 AND 29999 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) BETWEEN 30000 AND 49999 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) BETWEEN 50000 AND 99999 OPEN_PRICE(C.CLASS_NO) >= 100000
)
AND CLASS_AREA LIKE '%'||#{classArea1}||'%'
AND CLASS_AREA LIKE '%'||#{classArea2}||'%'
AND CLASS_TYPE =
0 1
AND CLASS_TYPE = 0 AND CLASS_TYPE = 1
AND (SELECT ROUND(AVG(RE_STAR), 1) FROM CLASS JOIN EPISODE USING(CLASS_NO) JOIN REGISTER USING(EP_NO) JOIN REVIEW USING(REG_NO) WHERE C.CLASS_NO = CLASS_NO) >= 4.0 ORDER BY STAR_AVG DESC
AND ((CLASS_AREA LIKE '%${search}%' OR CLASS_NM LIKE '%${search}%' OR CT_NM LIKE '%${search}%' OR MEMBER_NM LIKE '%${search}%' OR CT_DETAIL_NM LIKE '%${search}%'))
ORDER BY REG_COUNT(C.CLASS_NO) DESC ORDER BY STAR_AVG DESC ORDER BY HEART_COUNT DESC ORDER BY REVIEW_COUNT(C.CLASS_NO) DESC
AND CLASS_AREA = ( SELECT CLASS_AREA FROM ( SELECT CLASS_AREA, COUNT(*) COUNT FROM CLASS GROUP BY CLASS_AREA ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1 )
AND CLASS_AREA LIKE #{location}||'%'
ORDER BY REG_COUNT(C.CLASS_NO) DESC
ORDER BY NEW_EP_NO(C.CLASS_NO) DESC
AND THEME_ST = 3 AND SYSDATE BETWEEN THEME_START_DT AND THEME_END_DT AND THEME_NO = ${themeNo}
AND C.CLASS_NO IN (SELECT CLASS_NO FROM CLASS_WISH WHERE MEMBER_NO = ${memberNo})
) WHERE EP_PRICE IS NOT NULL
AND ROWNUM <= 12
